name: New York Community Bancorp, Inc.
description: New York Community Bancorp, Inc. (NYCB) is a leading bank holding company headquartered in Westbury, New York. Established in 1859, the bank has a long history of serving the financial needs of individuals and businesses in the New York metropolitan area. NYCB primarily operates through its wholly owned subsidiary, New York Community Bank, which offers a wide range of financial products and services including commercial and residential real estate loans, commercial loans, and various deposit accounts. The bank is particularly known for its expertise in multi-family lending, contributing significantly to its growth and stability. NYCB has a strong commitment to customer service, providing tailored solutions to meet the diverse needs of its clients. The bank operates a network of branches across New York, New Jersey, Ohio, Florida, and Arizona, further expanding its reach. In addition to traditional banking services, NYCB is actively involved in community initiatives and strives to enhance the economic well-being of the areas it serves. With a focus on sustainability and responsible banking practices, New York Community Bancorp continues to navigate the evolving financial landscape while maintaining its dedication to its customers and shareholders.

seo.meta_title: New York Community Bancorp, Inc. | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Discover New York Community Bancorp, Inc., a leading bank providing diverse financial services with a commitment to customer satisfaction and community involvement.

faq.question: What services does NYCB offer?
faq.answer: NYCB offers a variety of services including loans, deposit accounts, and financial products for individuals and businesses.

faq.question: Where is NYCB headquartered?
faq.answer: NYCB is headquartered in Westbury, New York, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of NYCB?
faq.answer: The CEO of New York Community Bancorp is Thomas R. Cangemi.
